title: unmute
description: Unmute a user from this server.
---

Unmute a user from this server.

## Usage

```sh
;unmute <user> [reason]
```

## Examples

```sh
# unmute @ToastedToast for the reason 'wrong user'
;unmute @ToastedToast wrong user
```

## Aliases

- untimeout
- removetimeout
- remove-timeout
- rmtimeout

## Required Permissions


:::note
Learn more about permissions in [Discord's FAQ](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206029707-Setting-Up-Permissions-FAQ).
:::

- Moderate Members
